title: Prize indemnity insurance (contests, hole-in-one, sweepstakes)
dataVerified: Contest sponsor, prize details, odds, coverage amount, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Policy status (active/paid). Link to Lloyd's/insurer system (sponsors and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake prize indemnity insurance. Domain binding verifies Lloyd's syndicate/specialist. High-value prizes ($1M hole-in-one, $1bn sweepstakes). Contest sponsor verification. Prevents sponsor from avoiding large prize payments.
